title: The London Train
description: Paul lives in the Welsh countryside with his wife Elise and their two young children. Over in London, Cora plans to move back to Cardiff, to the house she has inherited from her parents. She is escaping her marriage, and the constrictions and disappointments of her life. Connecting them is the London train, and a chance meeting that will have immediate and far-reading consequences for both Paul and Cora.
author: Tessa Hadley
